title: KHR_audio_graph Lowshelf Filter Node
description: The lowshelf filter allows all frequencies through, but adds a boost (or attenuation) to the lower frequencies. It implements a second-order lowshelf filter.

id.description: A unique identifier of the lowshelf filter node in the scene.

frequency.description: The upper limit of the frequences where the boost (or attenuation) is applied in Hz.

gain.description: The boost, in dB, to be applied. If the value is negative, the frequencies are attenuated.

bypass.description: Disables this filter while still allowing unprocessed audio signals to pass.
